Title: Requires school meal nutritional facts and ingredient list be provided for such meals
Summary: Requires school meal nutritional facts and ingredient list be provided for meals provided to students before serving such meal; allows such information to be posted on the school district website; requires the school district to notify parents or guardians of any changes in the meals, the new nutritional facts, and the itemized list of ingredients.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring school meal nutritional facts and ingredient lists be provided
